# Contributing

Thanks for contributing to `mp1-poly-axis-macro-paper`.

## Before opening a PR

- Read `README.md`, `AGENTS.md`, and `tasks/wip.md`.
- Open or link an issue describing the work.
- Keep changes scoped and reproducible.

## Workflow

1. Fork and create a feature branch.
2. Implement and test your change.
3. Update documentation when behavior changes.
4. Open a pull request with a clear summary.

## Links

- Issues: https://github.com/alexanderholman/mp1-poly-axis-macro-paper/issues
- Pull requests: https://github.com/alexanderholman/mp1-poly-axis-macro-paper/pulls
- Support: `/.github/SUPPORT.md`
